entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as laying the dinner table. She is one of the people present in the scene.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as asking questions, which Harry tries to escape from. She is one of the people present in the scene.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as grabbing two jugs of pumpkin juice and following Fleur and Hermione. He is one of the people present in the scene.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as saying something to Dean, and relighting the fire with him. She is one of the people present in the scene.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as being with Luna, and helping her relight the fire. He is one of the people present in the scene.

relationships.description: Harry followed Fleur, as he grabbed two jugs of pumpkin juice and tried to escape from her questions.
Luna was with Dean, helping him relight the fire.
